mapper.sql: id, page_title, page_body, page_ticker, page_status, page_html, page_created_time, page_creator, memo,show_title
mapper.select:
select
from sys_static_page where 1=1
and page_status=#{pageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and page_title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and page_created_time between CONCAT(#{page_created_time_after,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 0:00:00') and CONCAT(#{page_created_time_before,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 23:59:59')
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_static_page
id,
page_title,
page_body,
page_ticker,
page_status,
page_created_time,
page_creator,
memo,
page_html,

mapper.update:
update sys_static_page
page_title = #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_body = #{pageBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_ticker = #{pageTicker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_status = #{pageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_created_time = #{pageCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
page_creator = #{pageCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_html = #{pageHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
show_title = #{show_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
